SELECT B.SLT_ID, A.SLT_NM, B.DVC_ID, B.DVC_KIND, DL1.DL_CD_NM AS DVC_KIND_CD, B.DVC_TYPE, DATE_FORMAT(B.INST_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') INST_DT, B.USE_YN, B.REMARK
FROM SLT_FCLT_MST A LEFT JOIN SLT_DVC_INFO B ON A.SLT_ID = B.SLT_ID LEFT JOIN PLF_DL_CD_INFO DL1 ON B.DVC_KIND = DL1.DL_CD
WHERE B.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND SLT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || DVC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || DVC_KIND LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY B.SLT_ID, B.DVC_ID ASC;
